job.name: Execute_Action_PCA_Service
job.description: This workflow allows to manage the life-cycle of on an activated PCA service by executing an action such as Finish_XXXX, Pause_XXX... from the client side. It requires the following variables: $INSTANCED_ID is the instance id of the active service (to be retrieved from the Activated Service list in the cloud-automation portal) $ACTION is the name of the action to be executed. Possible actions are listed in the Full Services View of the started service in the cloud-automation portal.
